= Project Description =
  * 10 second elevator pitch: ICEIface aims to build an interface for ontology-based, complex datasets that will enable users to explore and interrogate the various elements of the dataset. The test case being employed is the enquiry-based undergraduate medical curriculum at the University of Manchester, which which exists in a newly created knowledgebase.
